name: Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.
description: Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a leading global investment banking, securities, and investment management firm. Founded in 1869, Goldman Sachs has established itself as a prominent player in the financial services industry, providing a wide range of services to a diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments, and individuals. The firm operates through several segments, including Investment Banking, Global Markets, Asset Management, and Consumer & Wealth Management. Goldman Sachs is known for its advisory services in mergers and acquisitions, underwriting, and capital raising. The company also offers various financial products, including securities, derivatives, and structured products. With a strong emphasis on technology and innovation, Goldman Sachs is increasingly focusing on digital banking and wealth management solutions, aiming to cater to the evolving needs of its clients. The firm’s commitment to sustainability and responsible investing is also evident in its initiatives to incorporate environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment processes. Goldman Sachs continues to navigate the complexities of the global financial markets while maintaining its reputation for excellence and integrity.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. | Leading Global Investment Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a premier global investment banking and financial services firm, offering a range of services from investment banking to asset management.

faq.question: What services does Goldman Sachs offer?
faq.answer: Goldman Sachs offers investment banking, global markets, asset management, and consumer & wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Goldman Sachs?
faq.answer: David Solomon is the CEO of Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Goldman Sachs headquartered?
faq.answer: Goldman Sachs is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.
